channel.title: This may be cool
channel.description:
ok, check this (custom real runescape client...) but i'll need some help with it like what deob is real runescape at? i'm thinking a 578.. but i may be able to make a client that has no-cliping and all for the real runescape..i think i can do it but i'll need some help.. btw, even if you have to use the main client i might be able to pass it.. i no some info on the rs client that it's at rite now..
btw, need help on real runescape's ip address..

item.title: This may be cool
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:10, topic:335878”]a random ip: world90.runescape.com
port: 43594
version: 597[/quote]

You forgot actual server port, update server port is 43594, each world uses a different port.
40000 + world number
For your example unless I’m mistaken, the port would be 40090, but its not important.

Read full topic

item.title: This may be cool
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:335878”]First off, this isn’t a new idea at all. MoparScape actually started out as a ‘custom’ pking/cheating client for real runescape, this was before there was such a thing as a private server. As stated above, no-clip on a real server is impossible as the server handles pathfinding and tells you where you can and can’t go.

Also, the runescape version changes weekly, and every week you would have to re-write the client with the latest version to be able to connect to the runescape servers.

And lastly, to find the latest version you can always look here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs/update.log
and
http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs/bin

To download the latest version.[/quote]
Oh cool!

Read full topic

item.title: This may be cool
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

First off, this isn’t a new idea at all. MoparScape actually started out as a ‘custom’ pking/cheating client for real runescape, this was before there was such a thing as a private server. As stated above, no-clip on a real server is impossible as the server handles pathfinding and tells you where you can and can’t go.

Also, the runescape version changes weekly, and every week you would have to re-write the client with the latest version to be able to connect to the runescape servers.

And lastly, to find the latest version you can always look here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs/update.log
and
http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs/bin

To download the latest version.

Read full topic

item.title: This may be cool
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Can’t no-clip, won’t be able to no-clip, and never will be able to no-clip. Route finding is done by the server, so there is no possible way anymore.

Read full topic

You would also have to update the cache every time RuneScape Updates, Making this a stupid idea.

My suggestion, Go find a pond, Jump in it… Then come back… Then tell me how many fish you see… Enjoy
